Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury (Vet.) -- Disabled Vet. Homestead Exemp.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in the Parish of Jefferson Davis, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21 (K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in the Parish of Jefferson Davis, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in Jefferson Davis Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of Jefferson Davis Parish voting on this proposition?

Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 3 -- 14 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
School District No. 3 Proposition
(Continuation)

Summary:  Continuation of a 10 year, 14 mills property tax for constructing, improving, maintaining and operating public school buildings and other school related facilities within and for School District No. 3, and acquiring equipment and furnishings therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 3 of the Parish of Jefferson Davis, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a special tax of fourteen (14) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $200,700 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating public school buildings and other school related facilities within and for the District, and acquiring equipment and furnishings therefor?
